name: Millipede of words
description:
The set of words is given. Words are joined if the last letter of one word and the first letter of another word are the same. Return `true` if all words of the set can be combined into one word. Each word can and must be used only once. Otherwise return `false`. ## Input ```if:csharp,cpp,javascript,java,groovy,ruby,vb,go,rust Array of 3 to 7 words of random length. No capital letters. ``` ```if:python List of 3 to 7 words of random length. No capital letters. ``` ## Example `true` Set: excavate, endure, desire, screen, theater, excess, night.
Millipede: desirE EndurE ExcavatE ExcesS ScreeN NighT Theater. ## Example `false` Set: trade, pole, view, grave, ladder, mushroom, president.
Millipede: presidenT Trade.
